B

Batteries - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries
The class Batteries implements a component for the batteries.
Batteries() - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries.Batteries
create a batteries component with one set of batteries in parallel, one set of one batteries in series, a generated URI for its reflection inbound port and the standard URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.
Batteries(int, int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries.Batteries
create a batteries component with given number of sets of batteries in parallel and in series, a generated URI for its reflection inbound port and the standard URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.
Batteries(String, int, int) - Constructor for class fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries.Batteries
create a batteries component with given number of sets of batteries in parallel and in series, the given URI for its reflection inbound port and the given URI for the in bound port offering the BatteriesCI component interface.
BatteriesCI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries
The component interface BatteriesCI defines the signatures of the services that are offered by batteries compoennts.
BatteriesConnector - Class in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries.connections
The class BatteriesConnector implements a connector for the BatteriesCI component interface.

BatteriesImplementationI - Interface in fr.sorbonne_u.components.hem2025e1.equipments.batteries
The interface BatteriesImplementationI defines the signatures of operations that can be performed by batteries components.
